# File lib/bit-struct/bit-struct.rb, line 62
    def describe opts
      bits = size
      if bits > 32 and bits % 8 == 0
        len_str = "%dB" % (bits/8)
      else
        len_str = "%db" % bits
      end
      
      byte_offset = offset / 8 + (opts[:byte_offset] || 0)

      yield ["@%d" % byte_offset, class_name, name, len_str, display_name]
    end
